## Checklist for Reviewer

- [ ] Verify all required fields are filled
- [ ] Check profile picture is uploaded
- [ ] Verify member type is from valid list
- [ ] Confirm email format
- [ ] Check bio uses 3rd person and includes relevant links
- [ ] Create member .md file in `content/pages/members/`
- [ ] Add profile picture to `content/images/people/`
- [ ] Test build locally
- [ ] Verify member appears in correct section
